Name: Dire Wolf Game Room
About the game: Collect your favorite tabletop and digital Dire Wolf board games in one convenient virtual place! The free Dire Wolf Game Room brings together award-winning apps and board games in a central hub that helps you find games, connect with friends, and expand your collection. Inside the Game Room, you'll find: Game Lobby – Find a game on the fly in the cross-title game lobby! Friends List – Take your friends with you wherever you go. Who's up for a game? Chat – Get to know your fellow players and cut deals at the table with Global and In-Game chat! News – Catch all of the latest across titles in one central bulletin board! The Game Room library includes support for: Digital Board Games Raiders of the North Sea Root Sagrada Yellow & Yangtze Tabletop Board Games Dune: Imperium Clank! A Deck-Building Adventure Clank! In! Space! Join the Dire Wolf Game Room community! It's game night somewhere.
